item.title: What to expect from me
item.description: After several years of making mistakes and being lucky because I had awesome graduate and undergraduate students, and patient collaborators, I realized that being explicit about expectations (or learning outcomes in an educational context) actually greatly reduces stress and increases accountability. I have consequently spent some time scouring the internet in search of starting points for these types of documents, and then I have added my own personal twists to them.
